articles.content: A Cambridgeshire tree surveyor and contractor has said he cannot keep clearing trees out of the roads in his area "for nothing". Ben Hudson says that he has moved several fallen trees in Waterbeach, … [+2082 chars]

articles.title: Go North East bus engineers to strike ahead of Christmas - Chronicle Live
articles.description: The bus engineers, who are striking over pay, will begin action on Monday, December 19, and the dispute will end on December 25
articles.content:
Bus passengers are being warned to expect disruption after engineers employed by Go North East announced strike action in the week before Christmas.
